name: Slime Killer 2: Revenge of the slimes
name_original: Slime Killer 2: Revenge of the slimes
description:
The slimes are back! After stealing 100 slimeballs and defeating the King Slime, someone has come for revenge... Can you defeat the 20 waves of enemies and battle this new foe?

#CREDITS#

Music from BenSound

Counters by Griffpatch
